solution_line_template: The cost of the rental for Thursday and Friday comes to ${weekday_rate} * {num_weekday_days} = $<<{weekday_rate}*{num_weekday_days}={weekday_cost}>>{weekday_cost}.
The cost of the rental for Saturday and Sunday comes to ${weekend_rate} * {num_weekend_days} = $<<{weekend_rate}*{num_weekend_days}={weekend_cost}>>{weekend_cost}.
The total cost of the rental comes to ${weekday_cost} + {weekend_cost} = $<<{weekday_cost}+{weekend_cost}={total_rental_cost}>>{total_rental_cost}.
The payment required for each person comes to ${total_rental_cost} / {num_people} = $<<{total_rental_cost}/{num_people}={cost_per_person}>>{cost_per_person}.
